  • org.janusgraph.graphdb.configuration中ConfigOption的使用

    声明为ConfigOption的org.janusgraph.graphdb.configuration中的字段
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.ADJUST_LIMIT  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.ALLOW_SETTING_VERTEX_ID  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.ALLOW_STALE_CONFIG  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.ALLOW_UPGRADE  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.ASSIGN_TIMESTAMP  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.AUTH_PASSWORD  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.AUTH_USERNAME
    Username and password keys to be used to specify an access credential that may be needed to connect with a secured storage backend.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.AUTO_TYPE  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.BASIC_METRICS
    Whether to enable basic timing and operation count monitoring on backend methods using the com.codahale.metrics package.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.BATCH_PROPERTY_PREFETCHING  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.BUFFER_SIZE
    Buffers graph mutations locally up to the specified number before persisting them against the storage backend.
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.CLUSTER_MAX_PARTITIONS  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.COMPUTER_RESULT_MODE  
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
    Default timeout when connecting to a remote database instance
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTE_CLASS  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.CUSTOM_SERIALIZER_CLASS  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.DB_CACHE  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.DB_CACHE_CLEAN_WAIT
    How long the database level cache will keep keys expired while the mutations that triggered the expiration are being persisted.
    static ConfigOption<Double> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.DB_CACHE_SIZE
    The size of the database level cache.
    static ConfigOption<Long> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.DB_CACHE_TIME
    The default expiration time for elements held in the database level cache.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.DROP_ON_CLEAR  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.FORCE_INDEX_USAGE  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.GRAPH_NAME  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.GRAPHITE_HOST
    The hostname to receive Graphite plaintext protocol metric data.
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.GRAPHITE_INTERVAL
    The number of milliseconds to wait between sending Metrics data to the host specified GraphDatabaseConfiguration.GRAPHITE_HOST.
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.GRAPHITE_PORT
    The port to which Graphite data are sent.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.GRAPHITE_PREFIX
    A Graphite-specific prefix for reported metrics.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.GREMLIN_GRAPH  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.HARD_MAX_LIMIT  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDAUTHORITY_CAV_BITS
    Configures the number of bits of JanusGraph assigned ids that are reserved for a unique id marker that allows the id allocation to be scaled over multiple sub-clusters and to reduce race-conditions when a lot of JanusGraph instances attempt to allocate ids at the same time (e.g. during parallel bulk loading) IMPORTANT: This should never ever, ever be modified from its initial value and ALL JanusGraph instances must use the same value.
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDAUTHORITY_CAV_RETRIES
    When JanusGraph allocates IDs with ConflictAvoidanceMode.GLOBAL_AUTO configured, it picks a random unique ID marker and attempts to allocate IDs from a partition using the marker.
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDAUTHORITY_CAV_TAG
    Unique id marker to be used by this JanusGraph instance when allocating ids.
    static ConfigOption<ConflictAvoidanceMode> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDAUTHORITY_CONFLICT_AVOIDANCE
    Sets the strategy used by ConsistentKeyIDAuthority to avoid contention in ID block allocation between JanusGraph instances concurrently sharing a single distributed storage backend.
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDAUTHORITY_WAIT
    The number of milliseconds the system waits for an id block application to be acknowledged by the storage backend.
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDS_BLOCK_SIZE
    Size of the block to be acquired.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDS_FLUSH
    If flush ids is enabled, vertices and edges are assigned ids immediately upon creation.
    static ConfigOption<Double> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDS_RENEW_BUFFER_PERCENTAGE
    Configures when the id pool manager will attempt to allocate a new id block.
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDS_RENEW_TIMEOUT
    The number of milliseconds that the JanusGraph id pool manager will wait before giving up on allocating a new block of ids.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IDS_STORE_NAME
    The name of the ID store.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.IGNORE_UNKNOWN_INDEX_FIELD  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INDEX_BACKEND
    Define the indexing backed to use for index support
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INDEX_CONF_FILE  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INDEX_DIRECTORY  
    static ConfigOption<String[]> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INDEX_HOSTS  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INDEX_MAX_RESULT_SET_SIZE  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INDEX_NAME  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INDEX_NAME_MAPPING  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INDEX_PORT  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INDEX_SELECT_STRATEGY  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INITIAL_JANUSGRAPH_VERSION  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.INITIAL_STORAGE_VERSION  
    static ConfigOption<Long> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.JOB_START_TIME  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LIMIT_BATCH_SIZE  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOCK_BACKEND
    Locker type to use.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOCK_CLEAN_EXPIRED
    Whether to attempt to delete expired locks from the storage backend.
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOCK_EXPIRE
    Number of milliseconds after which a lock is considered to have expired.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOCK_LOCAL_MEDIATOR_GROUP
    Configuration setting key for the local lock mediator prefix
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOCK_RETRY
    Number of times the system attempts to acquire a lock before giving up and throwing an exception.
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOCK_WAIT  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOG_BACKEND  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOG_NUM_BUCKETS  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOG_READ_BATCH_SIZE  
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOG_READ_INTERVAL  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOG_READ_THREADS  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOG_SEND_BATCH_SIZE  
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOG_SEND_DELAY  
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.LOG_STORE_TTL  
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.MAX_COMMIT_TIME  
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_CONSOLE_INTERVAL
    Metrics console reporter interval in milliseconds.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_CSV_DIR
    Metrics CSV output directory.
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_CSV_INTERVAL
    Metrics CSV reporter interval in milliseconds.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_JMX_AGENTID
    The JMX agentId through which to report Metrics.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_JMX_DOMAIN
    The JMX domain in which to report Metrics.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_JMX_ENABLED
    Whether to report Metrics through a JMX MBean.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_MERGE_STORES
    Whether to aggregate measurements for the edge store, vertex index, edge index, and ID store.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_PREFIX
    The default name prefix for Metrics reported by JanusGraph.
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_SLF4J_INTERVAL
    Metrics Slf4j reporter interval in milliseconds.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.METRICS_SLF4J_LOGGER
    The complete name of the Logger through which Metrics will report via Slf4j.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.OPTIMIZER_BACKEND_ACCESS  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.PAGE_SIZE
    Default number of results to pull over the wire when iterating over a distributed storage backend.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.PARALLEL_BACKEND_EXECUTOR_SERVICE_CLASS  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.PARALLEL_BACKEND_EXECUTOR_SERVICE_CORE_POOL_SIZE  
    static ConfigOption<Long> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.PARALLEL_BACKEND_EXECUTOR_SERVICE_KEEP_ALIVE_TIME  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.PARALLEL_BACKEND_EXECUTOR_SERVICE_MAX_POOL_SIZE  
    static ConfigOption<Long> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.PARALLEL_BACKEND_EXECUTOR_SERVICE_MAX_SHUTDOWN_WAIT_TIME  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.PARALLEL_BACKEND_OPS
    If enabled, JanusGraph attempts to parallelize storage operations against the storage backend using a fixed thread pool shared across the entire JanusGraph graph database instance.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.PROPERTY_PREFETCHING  
    static ConfigOption<Instant> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.REGISTRATION_TIME  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.REPLACE_INSTANCE_IF_EXISTS  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.SCHEMA_CONSTRAINTS  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.SCHEMA_MAKER_LOGGING  
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.SETUP_WAITTIME
    Time in milliseconds for backend manager to wait for the storage backends to become available when JanusGraph is run in server mode.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_BACKEND
    Define the storage backed to use for persistence
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_BATCH
    Enables batch loading which improves write performance but assumes that only one thread is interacting with the graph
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_CONF_FILE
    Path to a configuration file for those storage backends that require/support a separate config file
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_DIRECTORY
    Storage directory for those storage backends that require local storage
    static ConfigOption<String[]> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_HOSTS  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_PORT
    Configuration key for the port on which to connect to remote storage backend servers.
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_READ_WAITTIME  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_READONLY
    Specifies whether this database is read-only, i.e. write operations are not supported
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_ROOT
    Storage root directory for those storage backends that require local storage
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_TRANSACTIONAL
    Enables transactions on storage backends that support them
    static ConfigOption<Duration> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORAGE_WRITE_WAITTIME  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORE_META_TIMESTAMPS  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORE_META_TTL  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.STORE_META_VISIBILITY  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.SYSTEM_LOG_TRANSACTIONS  
    static ConfigOption<TimestampProviders> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.TIMESTAMP_PROVIDER  
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.TITAN_COMPATIBLE_VERSIONS  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.TX_CACHE_SIZE
    Configures the maximum number of recently-used vertices cached by a transaction.
    static ConfigOption<Integer> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.TX_DIRTY_SIZE
    Configures the initial size of the dirty (modified) vertex map used by a transaction.
    static ConfigOption<String> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.UNIQUE_INSTANCE_ID  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.UNIQUE_INSTANCE_ID_HOSTNAME  
    static ConfigOption<Short> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.UNIQUE_INSTANCE_ID_SUFFIX  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.USE_MULTIQUERY  
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> GraphDatabaseConfiguration.VERBOSE_TX_RECOVERY
